description: This source file contains utility functions for cryptographic operations, including generating UUIDs from strings, extracting domain references from URLs, and creating scoped salts based on app-specific information. It also includes unit tests for the salting functionality.

methods.name: uuid_from(r1: String, r2: String) -> String
methods.description: Generates a UUID v5 based on the input strings, returning it as a hyphenated string.

methods.name: extract_app_ref(app_url: String) -> String
methods.description: Extracts the domain and second-level domain from a URL string.

methods.name: salt_using_app_scope( app_scope: String, reference: String, id_salt: Option<IdSalt>, ) -> String
methods.description: Creates a scope-specific salt (UUID) based on app scope, a reference string, and optional salt configuration.

ctags.name: salt_using_app_scope
ctags.signature: ( app_scope: String, reference: String, id_salt: Option<IdSalt>, ) -> String

ctags.name: uuid_from
ctags.pattern: /^pub fn uuid_from(r1: String, r2: String) -> String {$/
